import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import toastr from 'cogo-toast'; export default function EditFlightx() { const parameter = useParams() const [aircraft_iata,setAircraftIata] = useState('') const [flight, setFlight] = useState({ id:0, aircraft_iata:'', airline_iata:'', airline_name:'', flight_status:'', flight_date:'', dep_id:'', dep_airport: '', dep_city: '', dep_country: '', dep_iata: '', dep_lat: '', dep_lng: '', dep_segment_order: 0, dep_segment_type: '', arr_id: '', arr_airport: '', arr_city: '', arr_country: '', arr_iata: '', arr_lat: '', arr_lng: '', arr_segment_order: 0, arr_segment_type: '' }) // Get Airports from flight microservice useEffect (() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8082/v1/flights/"+ parameter.id) .then( res => { console.log(res.data) setAircraftIata(res.data.aircraft_iata) setFlight({ id: res.data.id, aircraft_iata: res.data.aircraft_iata, airline_iata:res.data.airline_iata, airline_name:res.data.airline_name, flight_status:res.data.flight_status, flight_date:res.data.flight_date, // segment.airport:res.data. // stegment[0]?.airport:res.data.segments[0].airport dep_id:res.data.segments[0].id, dep_airport:res.data.segments[0].airport, dep_city: res.data.segments[0].city, dep_country: res.data.segments[0].country, dep_iata: res.data.segments[0].iata, dep_lat: res.data.segments[0].lat, dep_lng: res.data.segments[0].lng, dep_segment_order: res.data.segments[0].segment_order, dep_segment_type: res.data.segments[0].segment_type, arr_id: res.data.segments[1].id, arr_airport: res.data.segments[1].airport, arr_city: res.data.segments[1].city, arr_country: res.data.segments[1].country, arr_iata: res.data.segments[1].iata, arr_lat: res.data.segments[1].lat, arr_lng: res.data.segments[1].lng, arr_segment_order: res.data.segments[1].segment_order, arr_segment_type: res.data.segments[1].segment_type }) console.log(flight.id) } ) },[]) let submitForm = () => { let flightx = { id: flight.id, aircraft_iata: aircraft_iata, airline_iata: flight.airline_iata, airline_name: flight.airline_name, flight_date: flight.flight_date, flight_status: flight.flight_status, segments: [ { id: flight.dep_id, airport: flight.dep_airport, city: flight.dep_city, country: flight.dep_country, iata: flight.dep_iata, lat: flight.dep_lat, lng: flight.dep_lng, segment_order: flight.dep_segment_order, segment_type: flight.dep_segment_type }, { id: flight.arr_id, airport: flight.arr_airport, city: flight.arr_city, country: flight.arr_country, iata: flight.arr_iata, lat: flight.arr_lat, lng: flight.arr_lng, segment_order: flight.arr_segment_order, segment_type: flight.arr_segment_type } ] } console.log(flightx) // axios.put(`http://127.0.0.1:8082/v1/flights/${parameter.id}`, flightx) // .then( // toastr.success('Flight has successfully Updated!', {position : 'top-right', heading: 'Done'}), // setTimeout(()=> window.location.reload(), 5000) // ) } const content =

Update Flight

setFlight({id:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.id)}} />
setFlight({aircraft_iata:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.aircraft_iata)}} />
setFlight({airline_iata:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.airline_iata)}} />
setFlight({airline_name:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.airline_name)}} />
setFlight({flight_date:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.flight_date)}} />
setFlight({flight_status:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.flight_status)}} />
setFlight({dep_airport:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.flight_status)}} />
setFlight({dep_city:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.dep_city)}} />
setFlight({dep_country:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.dep_country)}} />
setFlight({dep_iata:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.dep_iata)}} />
setFlight({dep_lat:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.dep_lat)}} />
setFlight({dep_lng:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.dep_lng)}} />
setFlight({dep_segment_order:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.dep_segment_order)}} />
setFlight({arr_airport:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.arr_airport)}} />
setFlight({arr_city:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.arr_city)}} />
setFlight({arr_country:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.arr_country)}} />
setFlight({arr_iata:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.arr_iata)}} />
setFlight({arr_lat:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.arr_lat)}} />
setFlight({arr_lng:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.arr_lng)}} />
setFlight({arr_segment_order:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.arr_segment_order)}} />
     
return (
{content}
) }
